description: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) deploys information gathering tools focused on capturing IP configuration, running application, system information, and network connectivity information.(Citation: Symantec Tortoiseshell 2019)

external_references.description: Symantec Threat Hunter Team. (2019, September 18). Tortoiseshell Group Targets IT Providers in Saudi Arabia in Probable Supply Chain Attacks. Retrieved May 20, 2024.
